CHAT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Button used to connect to a channel.

CHAT_NEW_CHANNEL.description: The name of the new channel

CHAT_WELCOME_ADD_CHANNEL.description: Text used when the user wants to add a new channel

CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir quitter ce channel?
CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.description: Text of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.message: Your nickname is already in use. It has been changed to {nickName}
CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user tries to use a nickname already taken.

CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.message: Ce channel n'a pas pu être rejoint! Veuillez en choisir un autre!
CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user can not connect to a certain channel

CHAT_TITLE_DISCONNECT.description: Title of the prompt that show up when the user wants to disconnect from the server

CHAT_TEXT_DISCONNECT.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir vous déconnecter du serveur?
CHAT_TEXT_DISCONNECT.description: Text of the prompt that show up when the user wants to disconnect from the server

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE.message: S'il vous plaît tapez un message!
CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE.description: Notification text when the user didn't write a message.

CHAT_TITLE_WARNING.description: Title of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.message: S'il vous plaît tapez un nom de chaîne!
CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Warning when the user didn't choose a channel name.

CHAT_LOGIN_TITLE.description: Text when the user is connecting to a server.
